posts.post_content:
Asking $50k
This is the same price I paid for it last year in Goldin Auction February 2018.
Here is the link to that auction- [url]https://goldinauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=39738[/url]
I collected a 522 card T206 set but have since dismantled it and am moving into a different direction with my collecting focus.
The card was reholdered at the National last year.  I have scans if you would like to see them.
I have a very limited number of items that I would consider in trade, but primarily looking to sell.
Please send me a message if you would like more information or to discuss details.  Plenty of hobby references available.  
Thanks for looking and I am happy to answer any questions
Eric
Beautiful card for the grade and just a wonderful card in general. GLWTS

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1894582]Beautiful card for the grade and just a wonderful card in general. GLWTS[/QUOTE]

Thanks Tyler!  I think it could get a bump if regraded.
Eric is as reliable as they come - wish I could go after this one - it’s a beauty!

[quote name="the-illini" post=1894677]Eric is as reliable as they come - wish I could go after this one - it’s a beauty![/QUOTE]

Thanks Chris!  That means a lot. Looking forward to seeing you at the National!

Holy Smokes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I vouch for him.....

btw.....50 k I think is a bargain........:eek:

that will not last long:eek:

[quote name="mrvster" post=1894699]Holy Smokes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I vouch for him.....

btw.....50 k I think is a bargain........:eek:

that will not last long:eek:[/QUOTE]

Thanks Johnny. Much appreciated. Hope all is well.

I am open to reasonable offers.  Please message if you want to discuss.
Thanks!

Going to bump this up one more time then either consign or put it back into the collection. Pease contact to discuss if you have interest. Thanks for looking. 
Eric

I have plenty of interest :D
Could be an interesting N54 raffle ($100 entry)x(500 entries)
Defintely a show stopper piece you got there.

I don't buy into those things, but this one would be too good to pass up!!!


[quote name="pawpawdiv9" post=1897291]I have plenty of interest :D
Could be an interesting N54 raffle ($100 entry)x(500 entries)
Defintely a show stopper piece you got there.[/QUOTE]
Absolutely agree that this would be super fun but a logistical nightmare and as many of these types of "breaks" or raffles go, they often don't sell out and then where are you left?
